14#ifndef NS_SERVER_H
15#define NS_SERVER_H 1
16
17/*! \file */
18
19#include <inttypes.h>
20#include <stdbool.h>
21
22#include <isc/log.h>
23#include <isc/fuzz.h>
24#include <isc/magic.h>
25#include <isc/quota.h>
26#include <isc/random.h>
27#include <isc/sockaddr.h>
28#include <isc/types.h>
29
30#include <dns/acl.h>
31#include <dns/types.h>
32
33#include <ns/types.h>
34
35#define NS_EVENT_CLIENTCONTROL (ISC_EVENTCLASS_NS + 0)
36
37#define NS_SERVER_LOGQUERIES 0x00000001U /*%< log queries */
38#define NS_SERVER_NOAA 0x00000002U /*%< -T noaa */
39#define NS_SERVER_NOSOA 0x00000004U /*%< -T nosoa */
40#define NS_SERVER_NONEAREST 0x00000008U /*%< -T nonearest */
41#define NS_SERVER_CLIENTTEST 0x00000010U /*%< -T clienttest */
42#define NS_SERVER_NOEDNS 0x00000020U /*%< -T noedns */
43#define NS_SERVER_DROPEDNS 0x00000040U /*%< -T dropedns */
44#define NS_SERVER_NOTCP 0x00000080U /*%< -T notcp */
45#define NS_SERVER_DISABLE4 0x00000100U /*%< -6 */
46#define NS_SERVER_DISABLE6 0x00000200U /*%< -4 */
47#define NS_SERVER_FIXEDLOCAL 0x00000400U /*%< -T fixedlocal */
48#define NS_SERVER_SIGVALINSECS 0x00000800U /*%< -T sigvalinsecs */
49#define NS_SERVER_EDNSFORMERR 0x00001000U /*%< -T ednsformerr (STD13) */
50#define NS_SERVER_EDNSNOTIMP 0x00002000U /*%< -T ednsnotimp */
51#define NS_SERVER_EDNSREFUSED 0x00004000U /*%< -T ednsrefused */
52
53/*%
54 * Type for callback function to get hostname.
55 */
56typedef isc_result_t
57(*ns_hostnamecb_t)(char *buf, size_t len);
58
59/*%
60 * Type for callback function to signal the fuzzer thread
61 * when built with AFL.
62 */
63typedef void
64(*ns_fuzzcb_t)(void);
65
66/*%
67 * Type for callback function to get the view that can answer a query.
68 */
69typedef isc_result_t
70(*ns_matchview_t)(isc_netaddr_t *srcaddr, isc_netaddr_t *destaddr,
71 dns_message_t *message, dns_aclenv_t *env,
72 isc_result_t *sigresultp, dns_view_t **viewp);
73
74/*%
75 * Server context.
76 */
77struct ns_server {
78 unsigned int magic;
79 isc_mem_t * mctx;
80
81 isc_refcount_t references;
82
83 /*% Server cookie secret and algorithm */
84 unsigned char secret[32];
85 ns_cookiealg_t cookiealg;
86 ns_altsecretlist_t altsecrets;
87 bool answercookie;
88
89 /*% Quotas */
90 isc_quota_t recursionquota;
91 isc_quota_t tcpquota;
92 isc_quota_t xfroutquota;
93
94 /*% Test options and other configurables */
95 uint32_t options;
96 unsigned int delay;
97
98 unsigned int initialtimo;
99 unsigned int idletimo;
100 unsigned int keepalivetimo;
101 unsigned int advertisedtimo;
102
103 dns_acl_t *blackholeacl;
104 dns_acl_t *keepresporder;
105 uint16_t udpsize;
106 uint16_t transfer_tcp_message_size;
107 bool interface_auto;
108 dns_tkeyctx_t * tkeyctx;
109
110 /*% Server id for NSID */
111 char * server_id;
112 ns_hostnamecb_t gethostname;
113
114 /*% Fuzzer callback */
115 isc_fuzztype_t fuzztype;
116 ns_fuzzcb_t fuzznotify;
117
118 /*% Callback to find a matching view for a query */
119 ns_matchview_t matchingview;
120
121 /*% Stats counters */
122 ns_stats_t * nsstats;
123 dns_stats_t * rcvquerystats;
124 dns_stats_t * opcodestats;
125 dns_stats_t * rcodestats;
126
127 isc_stats_t * udpinstats4;
128 isc_stats_t * udpoutstats4;
129 isc_stats_t * udpinstats6;
130 isc_stats_t * udpoutstats6;
131
132 isc_stats_t * tcpinstats4;
133 isc_stats_t * tcpoutstats4;
134 isc_stats_t * tcpinstats6;
135 isc_stats_t * tcpoutstats6;
136};
137
138struct ns_altsecret {
139 ISC_LINK(ns_altsecret_t) link;
140 unsigned char secret[32];
141};
142
143isc_result_t
144ns_server_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, ns_matchview_t matchingview,
145 ns_server_t **sctxp);
146/*%<
147 * Create a server context object with default settings.
148 */
149
150void
151ns_server_attach(ns_server_t *src, ns_server_t **dest);
152/*%<
153 * Attach a server context.
154 *
155 * Requires:
156 *\li 'src' is valid.
157 */
158
159void
160ns_server_detach(ns_server_t **sctxp);
161/*%<
162 * Detach from a server context. If its reference count drops to zero, destroy
163 * it, freeing its memory.
164 *
165 * Requires:
166 *\li '*sctxp' is valid.
167 * Ensures:
168 *\li '*sctxp' is NULL on return.
169 */
170
171isc_result_t
172ns_server_setserverid(ns_server_t *sctx, const char *serverid);
173/*%<
174 * Set sctx->server_id to 'serverid'. If it was set previously, free the memory.
175 *
176 * Requires:
177 *\li 'sctx' is valid.
178 */
179
180void
181ns_server_settimeouts(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int initial,
182 unsigned int idle, unsigned int keepalive,
183 unsigned int advertised);
184void
185ns_server_gettimeouts(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int *initial,
186 unsigned int *idle, unsigned int *keepalive,
187 unsigned int *advertised);
188/*%<
189 * Set/get tcp-timeout values.
190 *
191 * Requires:
192 *\li 'sctx' is valid.
193 */
194
195void
196ns_server_setoption(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int option,
197 bool value);
198/*%<
199 * Set the given options on (if 'value' == #true)
200 * or off (if 'value' == #false).
201 *
202 * Requires:
203 *\li 'sctx' is valid
204 */
205
206bool
207ns_server_getoption(ns_server_t *sctx, unsigned int option);
208/*%<
209 * Returns the current value of the specified server option.
210 *
211 * Requires:
212 *\li 'sctx' is valid.
213 */
214#endif /* NS_SERVER_H */
215
